title: Countries with the highest proportion of soccer players 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
The maximum Proportion of soccer players 19.8 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at The Netherlands where Proportion of soccer players is 10.4.
The difference of Proportion of soccer players between the highest and lowest Country is 9.4.
